info.name: Twitch Dark Theme Enhancer
info.description:
Modifies the current Twitch.tv dark theme to resemble its older dark theme.

Theme is currently broken on uso.kkx.one, that is beyond my control.
info.additionalInfo: Style Settings Top Navigation Menu: Choose between Purple or the Default grey colour. Smooth Chat Scrolling: Smooth scrolling effect with new chat room messages. Channel Info Background Colour: Select the colour used for the channel information bar below the video. Couch Mode: Press F11 to view stream and chat in full screen. Hide Footer: Hides Sign Up message when not logged in. Live Time Format (Experimental): Remove the seconds displayed from live time view. Note: Due to limitations this may not function as expected on all systems.

options.label: Grey (Gradient)
options.value: background: linear-gradient(0deg, #0E0E10, rgba(0, 0, 0, .25)), linear-gradient(150deg, rgb(46, 46, 48), rgba(0, 0, 0, .25)) !important

options.label: h:mm
Enable
